node.name: OptimJ Free Edition
node.shortdescription:
OptimJ is a Java based algebraic modelling language for operations research.

OptimJ models are directly compatible with Java source code, existing Java libraries such as database access, Excel connection or graphical interfaces.

OptimJ is compatible with development tools such as Eclipse, CVS, JUnit or JavaDoc.

OptimJ Free Edition comes with the following solver links: lp_solve, glpk, LP or MPS file formats.

For more information please visit: www.ateji.com/optimj/index.html
node.body:
OptimJ is a Java based algebraic modelling language for operations research.

OptimJ models are directly compatible with Java source code, existing Java libraries such as database access, Excel connection or graphical interfaces.

OptimJ is compatible with development tools such as Eclipse, CVS, JUnit or JavaDoc.

OptimJ Free Edition comes with the following solver links: lp_solve, glpk, LP or MPS file formats.

For more information please visit: www.ateji.com/optimj/index.html
